title: Expository Writing and Research Papers

vocab.definition: Writing that explains, informs, or describes a topic using facts
A sentence that clearly states the main idea of an essay
Facts, examples, or details that prove or explain the main idea
The first sentence of a paragraph that states the main idea
The final paragraph that summarizes main points and restates the thesis

teachingNotes: Teach the five-paragraph essay structure. Practice writing clear thesis statements. Emphasize using reliable sources and citing evidence properly.
